summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2034, for the improvement of Fourth Avenue North, from Prospect Street to Highland Drive, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and constructing cement sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 20439, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
